DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe night-time use investigational lubricant eye drop .
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation Nighttime Retention Effect Investigational Lubricant Eye Drop ( FID 115958D )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Documented diagnosis dry eye 2 . Current use eye ointment tube gel 1 . No nighttime contact lenses wear throughout study period 2 . Must punctal plug insert within 30 day precede enrollment
